title: You’re Looking at Art. Someone Blocks Your View. Then What?
description: For some art lovers, there’s no pathway too narrow for a casual scooch between a spectator and a painting to seem unwise.
body: For some art lovers, there’s no pathway too narrow for a casual scooch between a spectator and a painting to seem unwise.

title: Katherine LaNasa Earned Her Role in ‘The Pitt’ the Hard Way
description: The actress received an Emmy nod for her performance as a seasoned E.R. nurse, a woman who has seen it all and lived to keep fighting. So has LaNasa.
body: The actress received an Emmy nod for her performance as a seasoned E.R. nurse, a woman who has seen it all and lived to keep fighting. So has LaNasa.

title: Museum’s Update Sends a Message: Native Artists Are Still Here
description: At San Francisco’s de Young, an Indigenous team of scholars and artists is rethinking the display of Native objects and helping to rebuild fraught community ties.
body: At San Francisco’s de Young, an Indigenous team of scholars and artists is rethinking the display of Native objects and helping to rebuild fraught community ties.

title: A High-Wire Act: Bringing Circus and More to New York’s Public Spaces
description: The Down to Earth festival answers a pandemic-era call for changes in the performing arts, offering free events in city parks and urban spaces.
body: The Down to Earth festival answers a pandemic-era call for changes in the performing arts, offering free events in city parks and urban spaces.
